title: HPI 01 - Begin at the End - An Introduction to Philosophy in India
itunes:title: HPI 01 - Begin at the End - An Introduction to Philosophy in India
description: In this introduction to the series, Peter Adamson and Jonardon Ganeri propose that Indian philosophy was primarily a way of life and search for the highest good.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
